t: Amazon.com: The Pirate Inside: Building a Challenger Brand Culture Within Yourself and Your Organization eBook : Morgan, Adam: Kindle Store
s: His first book on challenger branding, 'Eating the Big Fish', was such a brilliant read. 'The Pirate Inside' got off to a promising start, but then parts of it began to seem like a rehash of 'Eating the Big Fish' (minus the brilliant insights). Other parts of the book seemed unnecessarily drawn-out, possibly because they lacked substance. Some of the advice in this book is old news...
